name: Premium Dog Food
description: High-quality nutrition for adult dogs with balanced protein and essential nutrients.
features: Contains omega-3 fatty acids for healthy skin and coat

name: Cat Scratching Post
description: Durable sisal scratching post with perch, perfect for cats who love to scratch and climb.
features: Natural sisal material is attractive to cats

name: Bird Cage Deluxe
description: Spacious bird cage with multiple perches and feeding stations for small to medium birds.

name: Fish Tank Starter Kit
description: Complete 20-gallon aquarium setup with filter, heater, and decorative elements.

description: Silent spinner wheel for hamsters and other small pets, promotes exercise and well-being.
features: 8.5 inch diameter suitable for all hamster sizes
Solid running surface prevents feet injuries

name: Dog Bed Orthopedic
description: Comfortable memory foam bed for dogs with joint issues, machine washable cover.

name: Cat Toy Assortment
description: Set of 5 interactive cat toys including feather wands, mice, and balls with bells.

name: Reptile Heat Lamp
description: UVB heat lamp essential for reptile health, promotes vitamin D synthesis.
features: 10.0 UVB output ideal for desert species

name: Puppy Teething Toys

features: Various shapes for different chewing styles

name: Automatic Pet Feeder

features: Program up to 5 meals per day
Voice recorder to call your pet to eat
Portion control from 1/8 cup to 4 cups per meal
Backup battery system ensures feeding during power outages

name: Pet Carrier Backpack

name: Interactive Laser Toy
description: Electronic laser pointer toy that moves randomly to keep your cat entertained.
